content: {"locationId": "8880", "organizationId": "7320", "name": "Regional Food Bank Food & Resource Center", "address1": "2635 N Shields", "address2": "", "city": "Moore", "state": "OK", "zipCode": "73160", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "35.3617772", "longitude": "-97.5028119", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "ZIP CODE:  73026, 73065, 73069, 73072, 73119, 73129, 73135, 73139, 73145, 73149, 73150, 73159, 73160, 73165, 73170", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "A program of the Regional Food Bank of Oklahoma, the Regional Food Bank FRC was established in 2013 and is a shopper-choice pantry that allows neighbors to shop and select food, rather than receiving a pre-packed or standard bag of groceries.", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "405-600-3182", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "CSFP Program, Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Shopper Choice, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 64, "regionName": "Regional Food Bank of Oklahoma", "logoBlobNameSmall": "b268ff1b-39fa-45f4-a37e-421975c3f339.png", "website": "https://www.regionalfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["None-None (Call for Information)", "Monday 12:30 PM-5:30 PM", "Wednesday 10:00 AM-3:00 PM", "Thursday 10:00 AM-3:00 PM", "Friday 10:00 AM-3:00 PM", "Saturday 9:30 AM-11:30 AM [ 3rd week(s)]"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
